comment: I found his lectures wildly inappropriate. He swore a lot during class, which although some students found it funny, I didn't find it professional and it severely hindered my ability to learn in the classroom. Otherwise, he seemed nice enough but his exams are pretty brutal, even after the curve.
Brooking is hands down the funniest teacher I've ever had. I would take him again in a heartbeat even an 8 am. Easy online quizzes and three tests no super heavy weighted final.

Dr. Brooking was hilarious! Tests are very long and kind of confusing but if you read the book and fill in the provided Power Points then you'll be fine. I am not a history person and I understood everything we talked about. He's very sarcastic and cusses lot but it makes the class enjoyable. He goes at a great pace and is very clear and helpful.

I loved professor Brooking! His class was hilarious and well planned. The tests were simple and followed the book & lectures. Best 8am I've enrolled in so far. I'd definitely recommend this professor!
Brooking definitely keeps the class interesting. Hated history before him..still do. But definitely not as bad as it was before! GREAT GUY!

Professor Brooking is hilarious and helpful. He does like to let known his personal beliefs so beware if that will bother you (: First test= so easy. All the rest are extremely difficult. You have to have background knowledge of history or you will not get an A. Tough tests, but other than that he's really cool and laid back.

I loved Professor Brooking! His teaching style is wonderful. You will laugh every time you come to class. He has ppts, just with pictures, but he makes clear what you need to write. Keep up with reading.. Tests are not just remembering vocabulary.. know the context! He gives extra credit too. He is a great professor!

Outstanding lecturer.  Insights and analysis go beyond the text book and are very interesting.  Very likeable professor and offered many times to students that he can be contacted for help.  A fair amount of work, but a decent grade is doable if you make the effort.  Great class and content.
Overall, hilarious professor. He makes sure everyone is laughing and still learning at the same time. Quizzes almost every day, but starts out much more lenient. Very reasonable about grades.

Prof. Brooking was very entertaining and engaging. His lectures are humorous you will enjoy his class. Its not mandatory to go to class but i would because his lectures line up with the study guide which he goes over before the test. His tests are almost verbatim from the study guide. He helps you learn the material through the humorous lectures.
He is a very articulate, exciting, exuberant teacher! He definitely wakes you up in the morning with his teaching! He makes History inviting and worth knowing! GREAT GREAT TEACHER!

By far my favorite professor. Prior to this class I had no interest in History. He made the class fun and exciting and I looked forward to coming to class everyday. If you take good notes and review the study guides you will do fine. He keeps class interesting with his jokes and fun ways to make you understand what is being discussed in class.

Very Simple Class. If you come to lectures, take notes, do the online assignments and study, it's very easy to get a good grade. There is a CONNECT online website for quizzes and practice things. It's $10 if you don't buy the book. I wouldn't recommend buying the book It was $70 or $80, and was loose leaf. I hardly used it and now I can't return it

Probably one of the most entertaining professors I've had! Keeps the class interesting with all of his jokes and perspectives on history. Gives random quizes to encourage students to come to class but they're super easy, some just require your name. You have to study for his tests and take good notes, but offers lots of extra credit! Overall great!
Awesome professor. He makes class fun and he has a great sense of humor. You will need to take notes and study, but the class isn't that bad. I would take him again if I could.
Hilarious prof. He goes pretty fast through the material but its not too bad. The tests weren't too hard. it was a pretty easy class.

Professor Brooking is overall an amazing teacher. He has an amazing sense of humor, and even though it was an 8AM class, I never even had the urge to fall asleep. His tests were very hard; there were times when I knew the info but couldn't discern what the questions were asking. Not an easy A, but worth it. You will laugh AND learn.

The professor was good, and the material was kept pretty interesting, but the tests were hard. He doesn't provide written notes, so you can't miss a day without missing alot. I had him for an 8AM summer course and still enjoyed it, though some of his test questions were obscure.
Wonderful professor SO FUNNY. He will keep you awake and laughing the entire time, even in a 3 hour summer class. Never a dull moment and easy as far as test and quizzes go as long as you study.
BEST PROFESSOR EVER! He is so funny and keeps class interesting. You have to study for the tests, but as long as you go over the lecture notes and read the assigned readings you will be fine.

Prof Brooking is in one word - AWESOME! Best Prof in KSU. He has a great sense of humor and the class material was really enlightening. Really kept the lecture interesting. Lucky to have had him in the summer! :D

AWESOME.GO TO CLASS B/C AT TIMES, ATTENDANCE IS USED AS A QUIZ GRADE. I'M NOT A HIST. PERSON, BUT, I KNOW A LITTLE AFTER TAKING HIM THIS SUMMER. I'M FINISHING WITH AN A!!!! BOOK IS A MUST B/C OF QUIZZES. HAVE TO STUDY HARD FOR HIS TEST THOUGH.

Easy class. I'm not good with history and he made this class extremely easy to get at least a B in. His lectures are disorganized but the website is helpful. He drops the three lowest quiz grades and lowest test grade. Key is to go to class for the attendance quizzes, take notes, read the book, and do the study guides!

Great professor, he made class enjoyable.  His tests were very difficult though, I really had to work for a B (although I am not very good with history).  He gives a few extra credit opportunities and easy quizzes which average as a test grade.  Funny and interesting guy, I do recommend him if there isnt an easier teacher available

Would not recommend taking Prof. Brooking. For now, he's too concerned with getting his doctorate & used tests that were outdated or something.  Tests did not reflect what was covered in lectures or textbook.

He is a GREAT professor. His lectures are very interesting and clear. He is so funny and knows how to keep your attention. You have to work for your grade! Do the textbook reading and take notes during class! I totally recommend him.

If you have an interest in history, take Professor Brooking. He tends to skim over periods of American history that he finds boring and goes into detail for other periods. The book(s) are a must buy because there will be quizzes and exam questions over the reading. The exams are not easy, but if you study, you'll be fine. Read below for more info.

Great teacher! Key is come to class and take notes his test are worded different so pay close atention. He made history fun. I was very pleased with how he taught racism some say he was a **** I say very "tounge and cheek" TAKE HIM! but you will work for your grade
He is a great professor. His lectures are interesting, and he covers everything you need to know in class. I really enjoyed his class, even though I hate history.

I love this class. His lectures keep you interested. Go to class and take notes. The test aren't that hard if you study and do the study guide he posts. Easy reading quizzes. I would take this class again.

Mr. Brooking is an amazing teacher! I was horrified going into test 1 but by the end of the year I was sad that the class was ending. Reading and extensive note-taking is a must along with studying...yes studying. However, if you do what he asks of you it is an easy, pleasant, and absolutely enjoyable A.
Good teacher, knows his stuff, but his tests are way too hard, the questions seemed vague alot of the time.

Teacher was very helpful, class was very interesting. Unfortunately, he is also very full of himself. When I was unable to attend class due to PREGNANCY, he was very unforgiving, unlike all of my other teachers. Even though his syllabus doesn't state it,  you ABSOLUTELY NEED internet for the class. He quizzes you on videos that don't always work.

Makes Hx interesting. Good Teacher. Laid-back attitude. Attendance not mandatory but u will get better grades if u attend class,read Hx book & use study guide. Drops lowest grades, allow retakes & will curve if overall class test scores are low. Problem - he sometimes cancels class at the last minute but I would DEFINITELY takes his class again.

Mr. Brooking has a great personality, funny guy. He curves and drops the lowest test and quiz score (his tests are not the easiest). However, he missed a good amount of days, therefore rushing the material when we came back. If he had attended class more, I believe I would have enjoyed the class more than I did

Professor was pretty unorganized. Tests were fairly hard but come mostly from study guides. He drops lowest test and quiz. Usually curves grades a little. Offers a little extra credit. Really a nice guy and will answer any questions.

This professor is highly organized, he even has his own webpage, that outlines the class two weeks in advance. I am not very good at history, but he makes class interesting and uses videos and clips to reiterate the concept. One suggestion, do the study guides and read the material and you should do very well.

He was completely unorganized the whole semester. I do NOT consider showing up with a documentary to show every other class period an effective style of teaching, & he was very good at getting off-topic and never getting around to the actual material. It was not hard to get an A, but when I take a class, I hope to LEARN something.

Very laid back teacher, presents material in an open format and encourages participation. Occasionally cancels class, but this was not an issue for me. Works with students on low test scores/retakes. Good teacher if you take notes and study the material in the study guide. Would recommend if you want an interesting class in a good atmosphere.

Class was ridiculous. I am big into history so I caught him multiple times saying things that were absolutely wrong. It was unbelievable. If you complain enough you will end up with a good grade but if you want to get something out of the course do not take him. Terrible class.
Very unorganized. Tests were impossible, but he did give a curve

Brooking canceled class randomly, often leaving us with no lecture notes for chapters that we would be tested on. He goes on a lot a tangents, and gets really behind. He quizzes daily, but they aren't hard if you read. Tests are heavily based on reading- book is essential. His attitude towards students is condescending. Not recommended.

I like Brooking's style, but he gives a quiz a day.  Research paper is typical history style, as it does not leave a lot of direction to work with.  This class is core curriculum, but I will also be taking his 2111 for History Majors because I think that he is quite a good teacher, and he leaves you well prepared for his tests.
Very nice teacher. Class is not too hard but be prepared- you have a quiz almost every class of 5-10 questions or maps but he lets you drop a couple of your lowest.
